1.title: Choose a branch...

11.title: Park

choices: Head on over to the soda lounge.
12.content:
It's a Saturday afternoon and you're armed to the teeth. Armed to the teeth with 25 dollars worth of quarters with the biggest arcade in the state in front of you. Time Crisis, House of the Dead, Galaga, Gradius, DDR, even skeeball, you're primed and ready for a fun day. But first, you need a drink.

You quickly head on over to the soda counter and plunk down a dollar bill for your favorite soda, which the girl is more than happy to offer to you. As you pop open the drink with a 'fizzle', you wander back to the arcade floor, looking around. To your left is a row of DDR machines. Straight ahead are a bunch of the popular shooters. To your right is the soda lounge. And that's about as far as you can see. There's a bunch more beyond your line of sight, proving just how huge this arcade is. You do know that there's a new, popular game in the back...

As you drink the familiar soda, something feels strange as it passes over your tongue and flows into your throat...it's almost strange, tingly, and bitter...and it's making you sick. Nausea is setting in. Quickly you look at the expiration date, as you've had problems there before, but the soda still seems to be fresh. What's wrong with it then?

Before you can even begin to think about a refund, your vision suddenly goes blank. You never even feel yourself hit the ground...

An instant later (you don't know how long it could have been) you wake up on a thick, colorful fuzzy surface. It almost looks like an expensive carpet, except...it's huge. And there's a rumbling noise around you...BOOOOM!

A gigantic, pink and white wall, no, a sneaker, lands in front of you. Mere inches away...putting two and two together causes you to realize that...well, you have been shrunk. And you thought the arcade was big before.

If you don't act fast, you will be erased. Stepped on by unsuspecting passerby, like a bug. There is only one course of action...get somebody's attention!
12.title: One Fun Day at the 'Cade

choices: Relax, don't waste all your energy just yet...
121.content:
(Stop and take a moment to really contemplate your next move, you're much smaller now, you can't simply go about doing things as a normal person would do. You've already made your first mistake...)

You start on your path towards the Soda Lounge the area you had just left and freshly shrunken from. Making your way across the massive landscape of the arcade you're wary of the sky above you, yes the sky, at the size of a insect the ceiling of the arcade may has well been the sky.

You duck behind every exposed edge you get a chance too, the clipped end of an arcade machine; an overturned box of some random candy. You stagger back into the Soda lounge area and the first thoughts on your mind would of course have to be talking to the clerk you had spoken to when you first received your can of soda that left you in your current minuscule state.

Just as you steady your legs and take in a deep breath to continue your movement across the floor a thunderous clash erupts right before you. A cup of soda filled to the brim with ice and grape flavored liquid sugar smashes down inches ahead of you. With the tsunami of fluids afterwards you're lost to the flow and a sometime later you resurface. Your head was bleeding slightly, you must have been knocked silly by a cube of ice.

You're unaware of how long you've been out but the arcade is still extremely active and...and...and you can't move! Twitching your limbs madly you find you've become stuck in a dried lake of soda.

You figure with enough squirming you could free yourself from the holds. Around you ice cubes still tower as they slowly melt into the pool the water seeping out over the soda covered floor.

Matters get worse for you however when a group of titans sit at the table before you, a mighty pack of them with feet that could turn cities to dust in seconds and you, an insect before them continue to squirm in your soda binds...or do you...?
121.title: Soda Stuck

1211.content:
You keep squirming with all of your might, fear motivating you and getting the adrenaline going already. Slowly, bit by bit, you're pulling yourself free. The globs of soda stick to you even as you start to rise, but you can make it.

"Come on, come on..." you say to yourself...and just as you're about to pull yourself free, you hear a damning voice.

"Eww! That's gross..." somebody says. "Squish it."

Crap! You've been spotted! As the feet next to you start to shift, you go into panic mode. If only you could pull free and get out of the way! A shadow casts over you. You gotta escape now! Pulling one arm free of the gunk, you start to work on the oth-

That's the last thing you get a chance to do before a hard weight presses on your back. There's only about a second before you hear your body make a sickening crackling noise and all thoughts end after a few seconds of excruciating pain. The girl reaches down and wipes you off her sneaker with her napkin, chucking you into the garbage.

Next time, don't squirm around like a bug on the floor.
1211.title: Escape Attempt

choices: One of the girls picks up the sock, knocking you into it
The waitress comes over to the table
One of the girls looks under the table and sees you
1212.content:
You realize that it would be pointless to try and escape with things as they were now. So you decided to wait for the melting ice to soak up the soda and loosen you up some more.


Meanwhile, the titans who were sitting down at the table you just happened to be at sounded like they were all girls in their teen years. You couldn't see their faces from where you were now, but you could still see their feet as they as you lifted your head up a slight bit.


The girl closest to your right had flip-flops on and had red nail polish on her toes and seemed to be shifting her feet around a lot. The girl closest to you on your left had cowboy boots on and looked like she was trying to remove them. Then the other two at the far end who were still close enough to reach you with their feet were both wearing sky-blue flats with lose white socks.


"So girls, are we all set up for the sleepover later tonight?" You could hear the girl to your right say as her feet slid near your body.


"You bet! It'll be loads of fun." The girl to your left said as her boots slammed down next to your body. Sending a shock-wave that loosened you up just a tad bit.


"I sure don't mind spending some more time with the new girls." The girl to the far left said as she bent down to lift up her socks.


"Yeah. They're so easy to get it on with." The last girl on the far right said as she pulled her foot out of her flats and put them back in over and over again.


"Wow. You two sure do have a one track mind don't ya?" The girl to your right said as she slid her feet back away from you.


"Oh shut up Megan. Don't tell me you don't like having your brains fucked out by a woman?" The girl to the far right said as she lifted her foot up to her chair it back down and slammed it back down. Sending a smaller shock-wave that didn't have any effect on getting you loose.


"Quiet Ashie! Do you want the whole town to know about us?" The girl to the far left said as she half stood up and leaned over the table.


"Oh fine sis. But I'm just saying, it's not like any of us have had any sort of chance getting it on with a man." Ashie said as she lifted her foot up to the chair once again. But this time reached down just to scratch it. She scratched it until her sock got caught on her fingernails and she flicked them off. Causing them to land right on top of you. The sock was wet with sweat as you were forced to smell them until she went to retrieve them.


"Yeah. It's sad that no man ever wants to go out with us. Other women are so lucky i guess." The girl to you closest left said as she finally took her sweaty, wrinkly feet out of her cowboy boots and placed them right over the sock you were under. Now you had to bear with the pressure of this girl's feet as they rubbed you around. The only good news was that her feet rubbing you around was loosening you up rather well.


"You said it Yuna." Megan said as her feet slid out of her flip-flops and moved under the sock you were under. You could only watch as Megan's toes pushed you further to the left. But as soon as they stopped, you realized that that one push was what you needed to be unstuck. But you were still trapped under a sock with Yuna's feet overhead. And Megan's toes were nudging you every two seconds.


"Oh come on girls. We still have each other. Isn't that what matters most?" You head Ashie say. But couldn't see what her feet were doing at this time.


"Yeah. You're right! To Hell with men. It's us girls for life." Then the other far off girl said as you felt Yuna's foot lift off of you. Allowing you to get up quickly and stand up near the hole of the sock. Then before you could even plan your next move...
1212.title: Relax, don't waste all your energy just yet...

choices: No. You are crushed before you can get away.
Yes. You manage to get off of the mat before you get stepped on.
Sort of... You grab one of the girl's shoelaces, and climb on top of her shoe.
122.content:
You figure that with how popular the DDR games are, you could get someone's attention by heading over to one of those massive mats and climbing on. As you get on top of the enormous dance mat, you hear a loud booming sound. You look up to see a pair of girls heading over to your location. As soon as they step onto the mat, you try to get their attention. It doesn't take you very long to figure out that they can't hear you.

As the girls each insert a quarter into the machine and begin dancing, you quickly realize that it was probably a mistake to get on this particular machine. The girls' stomping feet come crashing down on either side of you, and you only barely manage to stay out of their way. You know that your only hope of survival is for you to get off of this giant dance mat of death!


Do you manage to make it to safety?
122.title: Dance for your life!

1221.content:
This mistake that you made ended up being a fatal one. As the girls continue to stomp the mat in their dance, you quickly grew tired from dodging their descending shoes. There was never an opening for you to safely escape, and you were running out of energy fast. The two dancing girls were having a blast, and they were completely oblivious to your misfortune. After a while, your body had been worn down too much to continue.

One of your dodges was just a second too slow, and the girl's foot came crashing down on top of your legs. Your legs from the knees down were now completely crushed beyond recognition. As you screamed out in agony, the girl's foot came down again. This time, your entire left arm was smashed into paste beneath it. The pain was unimaginable, and you desperately tried to drag yourself off of the mat using your good arm.

Before you could even move an inch, the giggling girl's foot came down upon you once again. Without even knowing it, the girl crushed your remaining arm right beneath her foot. It quickly became obvious that you weren't going to make it out of this situation alive. You had no more arms, and your legs were destroyed half way down. This oblivious girl was unknowingly taking your body apart with each stomp.

You simply rolled over onto your back and watched as the sole of the beautiful girl's massive shoe slammed down on you once again, this time grinding your stomach and all below it into pulp. You knew that the next impact would end your life once and for all. By now, you had given up all hope of escaping this situation alive. You embraced the fact that this girl was going to end your pathetic life right here and now. You watch in unimaginable agony as her rubber sole lowered down and pressed on your body.

The girl's shoe encompassed your entire body, and without any real effort on her part, your miniature body popped like a grape beneath her unrelenting foot. She didn't feel a single thing as she had unknowingly ended your life, as your body put up little to no resistance against her massive strength. The two girls finished their game without even noticing your existence. As they walked through the arcade to decide what to do next, the girl who crushed you began to notice her foot sticking to the floor a bit as she walked.

"Hold on Lindsy, I think that I stepped in some gum or something. Do you have a tissue that I could use to get it off?"

"Sure Amy, hold on."

The other girl handed her a tissue from her pocket, and she scraped your mangled remains off of the bottom of her shoe without a second thought. Throwing the tissue into the garbage can, the girls continued on their way. They remained forever oblivious to the tiny life that they had just ended.
1221.title: You're nothing more than gum on her shoe now...

choices: Dianne, who had just gotten out of the shower
Trisha, Dianne's Mom, going to the kitchen to make dinner
Anny, who was looking for a missing Doll
Tara, who was looking for her MP3
Yumi, who was looking for her bag
13.content:
Zak was freaked out, he just mysteriously shrunk at his best friend, Dianne's House. She was like a sister to him, and Zak had to admit, he had a bit of a crush on her. They were both only 15, which are Sophomore's in High School. "I gotta find Dianne!" Zak decided. He was in Dianne's Living Room, so he was not far from her room, which was at the end of the hallway, but what he was worried about, was Dianne's Baby Sister Anny!

Anny always had dolls with her, and if he was not careful, He may be mistaken as a doll too! "I need to get to Dianne's Room, but how can I get there fast?" Zak asked himself. But there was also the trouble of Trisha, Dianne's Mom, who hates bugs in her house, and Dianne's 1 Older Sister; Tara, and Tara's best friend; Yumi, who had recently moved from Japan.

BOOM!

"Holy Crap! What the heck was that?!" Zak yelled, covering his ears. He waited by the edge of the couch, and saw 2 socked feet. He looked up, and saw the socked feet belonged to...
13.title: Friends' House

131.content: Zak stood in awe at the gigantic goddess that he once called his best friend. As she wiggled her socked toes, Zak thought back to all the times he would secretly try and perv at Dianne's feet in order to fulfill his lifelong foot fetish. He used to sneak into her room and indulge himself in the pungent aroma of her worn out shoes and socks, and would constantly glance at her shoeless feet every chance he got. He couldn't possibly believe that those same feet now dwarfed him to the size of a bug, and where heading right for him! As Dianne made her way towards the couch, Zak was too terrified to move. As a final resort, Zak screamed with all of his might and waved his arms up and down in a desperate attempt for his new goddess to notice him. Does she though?
131.title: Dianne, your now gigantic best friend!

choices: No way! He's not her slave!
1311.content: Dianne never paid much attention to anything other than things that interested her. The ground, and thus the helpless bugs that stood in her way, never even formed a thought or a care in her mind. However, for some odd reason, and to the salvation of Zak, she decided to look at the ground before her feet before sitting down on the couch. "I wonder what that is", Dianne thought as she noticed a small bug, no larger than a bull-ant at her feet. Her first thought was to crush it under her sole, however, fate once again made her take a closer inspection. "Hmm, wait a minute. That is no bug. In fact, it looks like a small man!". Picking the man up, her jaw drops. "Zak, oh my god! How did you get so small?", she asked, flabbergasted at the fact that her lifelong best friend was now a helpless bug in the palm of her hand. "I...I don't know Dianne", Zak managed to sputter out, still shocked by the entire situation. "Wait. I did see one thing. It was a broken green bottle filled with some liquid. I got some on my leg by accident, but I really didn't pay it much attention.", Zak said rememberingly. "Well, my mother is a scientist, so maybe she knows something about that liquid and what happened to you. Thing is, she's on a work trip, and she doesn't get back until this weekend". Those last words rang in Zak's mind like a bell. He had to be shrunken for an entire week! "Don't worry Zak", Dianne said, as she interrupted his crisis. "I'll keep you under my protection until she arrives. And I know how much you like feet. Especially giant ones!". Zak's heart sank. Not only was he shrunk, and he had to endure it for an entire week, but his lifelong friend had known about his foot fetish this entire time! How could this day get any worse? "Yeah. I've pretty much always known. You always stare at them, and I'm neither stupid nor blind!", she said while laying on the couch and placing Zak at her feet. "I've even caught you smelling my shoes and socks. Oh, I bet you're so turned on by the smell now. My large, sweaty hot feet in your tiny face. How about a foot rub? Little bug?".
1311.title: She notices him!

choices: She step on him but still alive
132.content: Trisha wore her high heels and went to the kitchen to make some food.seems that no one was ate home but Trisha.he started running toward her however he was frightened because of the big high heels which was shaking the ground.finally he got the kitchen and started waving his arms to get Trisha's attention.she saw that something is moving on the ground 'STUPID BUG" she said.he ran away but can he dodge the unaware giantess attack?
132.title: Trisha, Dianne's Mom, going to the kitchen ...

1321.content:
Trisha looks down on you in complete disgust, only seeing you as a worthless bug. Her huge foot slides out of her high heel behind you as you run for your life. You try to look over your shoulder for a split second, seeing her red painted toes quickly approaching.

"N-nooo!", you scream as they get close, and you try to jump forward to escape.

Unfortunately, her huge toes come down on your legs. She smirks a bit and starts to press onto then, causing them to pop a bit. Then-

"Moooom! I need some help!", you hear Dianne yell.

Trisha looks down on you for a second, and then lifts her toes, releasing you. "I'll be right back bug, don't move...", she says quietly. She then puts her shoe back on and goes to Dianne.

You take your chance and try to find a hiding spot. After a moment of looking around, you hear thuds of footsteps coming towards the kitchen. Your first thought is that it's Trisha coming back, but it could be someone else. You run and hide under a cabinet, watching the entry of the kitchen, and you see
1321.title: She steps on you, but you're still alive...

133.content: Anny was toddling down the hall, looking for one of her many dolls, Zak looks up in terror at the little girl, she is wearing socks, small sweatpants (With a clear bulge from her diaper) and a t-shirt. She looks down and thinks he's...
133.title: Anny, who was looking for a missing Doll

choices: Anny stuffs you in her diaper
1331.content: She cries, "Dolly!" And picks you up roughly. She toddles around with you going up the stairs to her room, where she puts you with her other dolls.
1331.title: A doll

1332.content: "Buggie!" She screams, and she...
1332.title: A bug

13321.content: What does she do with the "buggie"?
13321.title: Picks you up

choices: Help him, but keeping him as a pet
135.content:
Zak saw that the socked feet belonged to none other than, Yumi, who was looking for her bag. But, another truth was, Zak not only had a crush on Dianne, but also on Yumi, which was a soon-to-be Graduating Senior with Dianne's Older Sister Tara. Yumi was a hot Japanese Girl, who had a busty body. Yumi kneeled down, looking under the couch, and found her bag.

As Yumi got up, she saw a little jumping figure of of the corner of her eye. "Zak? Is that you?" Yumi asked in a Japanese accent. "Yeah! It's me! Please Help!" Zak yelled out. What does Yumi do?
135.title: Yumi, who was looking for her bag

14.content:
You should have known something was up when that foreign mall vendor girl gave you a free sample of 'Mysterious Shrinking Potion'. You didn't believe in magic, well, that stuff sure as hell wasn't fruit juice. Now you're the size of a bug and standing in the middle of your local mall.

"My God," you say to yourself. "What's going to happen to me?"

There is one thing that will happen to you if you're not careful: you'll get crushed, flat.

Think quickly, you can't just stand around here for long! Find a place where you'll be able to get help.
14.title: Small at the Mall

141.content:
GameStop was closest so you dive in. Quickly you hide under the nearest store shelf, hoping that someone will crouch down and see you. You can barely yourself think under the colossal thundering roar of hundreds of thousand foot titans creating earth-shattering footsteps all around. One of the all-powerful gods that have turned your life in a terrifying hell is coming closer to you. All you can see is their tall New Rock reactors, which made them even more imposing than most of the other feet that surround the behemoth.

You have a choice here. Bide your time and wait for someone to notice you on the floor, climb the titanic goth's boot and see where they head or trying to attract the giant's attention.
141.title: Cornered by an unknowing gothic god's boot.

choices: There's a knock on the door. The giant's girlfriend is here...
He heads to bed. Time to make your next move.
He applies a little bit too much pressure.
1412.content:
Jumping up to grab a lace, you manage to get a suitable hold inside a hole in the platform sole of the ungodly boot. You start to feel uneasy as the constant motion of the herculean creature that was now your world walked on and on and on. Hours passed and the goth went home. Their final destination was their bedroom, a grim and dark affair. As your unknowing captor took off their boots, the stench of the inside rushed outside making your life a smelly misery. You were under some kind of desk. Judging by the hairy legs that stuck out from the black and white stripey socks that were now settling in front of you. The giant you were now residing with was male.

You couldn't see anything beyond the bottom of the chair that the god was sitting upon. It was nestled upon a thick pillar of a height that rivalled the tallest skyscrapers compared to your pathetic and meagre size. You jump out of the hole and land softly in the thick purple carpet that was the floor.

However, bad news struck as soon as you hit the floor as a movement in the leviathan's feet meant that you were now caught under them. You now had a face full of damp, sweaty sock and it wasn't going away. You struggle to breathe in the pressure until...
1412.title: Climb the boot

1413.content:
Here goes nothing!

You run towards the feet of your first potential saviour. A stupid mistake. The giant turns around as another part of the store grabs their attention. A shift of the left foot brings the heavy, colossal boot that it wears squarely atop of you. All you can see is the monolithic treads of the boots coming down upon you. There's no chance of escape. You see the metal new rock logo found on the towering treads of all their boots, accompanied by a number 47 indicating the vast size of your executioner's foot. You look to your left and your right, hoping for a chance to escape.

You have no chance.

In no time, the air around you threatens to whisk you away as the boot hits the floor. Excruciating agony flows through your body as in one terrifying long instant, your bones crack and your entire being rips into a bloody pulp on the floor. The god-like being responsible for your death doesn't even notice your presence as they go to look at the latest PlayStation 4 titles on release, an insignificant smear just barely visible on the left boot sole.
1413.title: Get their attention right now!

choices: Settling back and coming up with a new plan
Running out and screaming up at the person, waving your arms
142.content:
You decide to head for the food court of the mall. After all, you are looking for someone who will look down and notice you, and hopefully take more than a few seconds to inspect you before deciding what you are. Not that you expect much help. Still, you felt it was necessary to try. If you can get someone's attention, maybe they can help you track down the girl who gave you the shrink potion and find an antidote, or hope that it wears off on its own after a while.

Looking around, you dash from one covered spot to another, watching as titanic feet crash to the ground from above, just people going about their day, none of them really caring much about what they might squash beneath their shoes. Which was just as well. At your size, you doubted anyone could tell you were a person from the floor. You were going to have to find a way to get closer to their faces. Someplace either high, or something they would pick up.

As you grow closer to the food court, you begin to notice a drastic change in the type of person you were seeing. When you'd shrunk near the bathrooms you'd encountered mostly older and family types, people about one and half to twice your own age, but as you got nearer you goal, the ages of the people you were seeing began to level off at about your own age. Not that that didn't make sense. After all, the arcade was right off the mall, and most parents tried to keep their kids away from that place, if at all possible.

After a few more minutes of walking, you finally make it to the food court, and look around, seeing no one you recognize, though studying their faces, or at least, what you can see of their faces, you begin to realize how different things look from this perspective. No one looks right. Not really foggy, like things in a distance, just, distorted. You can see every fault and flaw in their skin, and the images seem to move like liquid, probably a trick of the light at your size, as your eyes hadn't fully acclimated to your present height.

Shaking your head, you start into the food court, looking up from under the edging to try and find some friendly face you recognized. Good thing you were looking up too, as someone suddenly dropped a pocket full of change, coins larger than you were clattering to the floor, dimes, pennies and quarters rolling around like huge wheels for a moment, before falling with a horrible metallic clang sound on the tiled floor of the food court, a sound you knew was not nearly as loud to the people above you.

Looking up, you see a hand coming down to pick up the change, and get an idea. Probably not the greatest one you'd ever had, but then, drinking that potion wasn't the best idea either. Looking toward a quarter nearby, you figure you can grab onto it, and then get the person to notice you. But what then. If they see you, they may just shake you off, and even if bugs can survive falls like that, you're not so sure you could. Looking up, you see the hand growing closer, and take a deep breath before....
142.title: Food Court Bound

1423.content:
Running out toward the hand, you start to wildly wave your arms over your head, and scream as loud as you can. Not that you can get that loud, considering your size, still, them movement, while the person is looking down, is more than enough to attract their attention, as they stare down at your tiny form, and then gasp in shock, pulling back their hand like they thought you were poisonous or something, and then stumbling back into someone else.

Of course, this meant they probably thought you were a bug, which meant you should run for cover as fast as you possibly could. Unfortunately for you, however, the hand they had been holding their change in opened up, and with that open palm came coins flying everywhere, loose bits of change slamming to the ground all about you, seemingly with enough force behind them that they could smash you into a flat little smear on the tile, making your scream even more frantic as you ran for cover, only to trip on a fault in a tile.

And thus are you doomed, as a quarter rolls toward you, the face of the nation's first president spinning as it comes closer, and closer, until, at last, it hits you. You would expect there to be pain, and lots of it, but with shock, you feel nothing from it. Rather, there is a moment where you can sense a great weight, and then there is nothing below your waist. This fact makes you reluctant to open your eyes, as you lay there on the tile, feeling a warm puddle forming beneath you, but at last, you have no choice but to look.

What you see is....well, exactly what you expected. Your waist has been severed cleanly. A small line of smashed flesh still exists where your pelvis and everything was, and below that you can see your legs, twitching a little even after being cut off from you, as between the two parts a small river of blood is already beginning to run to the floor, the warm puddle coming out of there, as you simply stare incredulously at the remains of your body.

You don't get to stare long, however, as a shadow soon comes over you, and you turn your head from the horrific scene, to stare upward right into the skirt of some girl, who where's flat soled shoes. "Oh, poor buggie. He lost half his body. I suppose it wouldn't be right to let you try and live like that," says her voice, still sweet and rich, if very deep to your tiny ears, as the shock takes any edge off her tone. Smiling up at her, you almost seem to nod as her foot comes to fill your sky.

The flat sole means there is little time as her weight crashes down upon you. Even the pain killing properties of adrenaline aren't enough now to block the whole of the experience, though it's not too bad. Your ribs take the first brunt of the assault, your head being turned, so a few nano-meters shorter. Her weight crashes down on them like a titan, snapping them all at once, and sending them through you, long sharp points tearing into your inside, ripping through your organs, as shrapnel is sent everywhere, literally shredding your internal organs, adding to the pool of blood beneath you.

Your head goes next, and for a moment, you feel the enormous pressure of her mass on it, stretching it out as she smashes down on your hard, causing your eyes to bulge, your nose to bleed, and soon, your tongue to fall out as the blood vessel behind it bursts, giving you one instant of intense agony, before everything goes dark. You aren't conscious as she twists her heel, and you become a smear, unrecognizable as a human, on the sole of her foot, which is then cleaned off with a napkin, and thrown into the trash, where little bugs like you belong.
1423.title: Mercy Crushing

choices: She sees nothing but an icky bug writhing at her feet
143.content:
The shoe store seemed like the perfect idea. People would be looking to the floor, thus you obviously had the best chance of being found and saved there. You run in, making sure to dodge the footfalls of the unknowing and thus uncaring leviathans around you. Inside the shoe store, you opted to head for the nearest bench. Upon it you see the vast and beautiful form of a young, flame haired woman, Her hair was bound in a ponytail and behind her glasses, there was a face that radiated kindness.

She was trying on a pair of knee high, brown leather, flat riding boots. You run towards her and as she looks down to pull up the long zipper on the side of her potential new boots...
143.title: To the shoe store!

1431.content:
"EW! A bug!" A monstrous voice called out from the heavens.

info.brief_description: Unconventional macrophile story. You are shrunk to a half-inch and forced to survive.
info.description:
This is a story in which you, our main character, is shrunk, but things are a little...different from most stories. You won't find any women becoming inexplainably horny at the sight of your shrunken body and stuffing you into their panties, or mouths. This is as close to _real_ as it gets, as far as everyone else is concerned, you are an insect.

You are shrunk in one of five starting locations. Your goal is to A. Survive, and B. Get somebody's attention without them mistaking you for an insect. Some starting locations are easier than others. Most any wrong turns will lead you to an instant, squishy death or something similar.

EDIT: Story is now open for editing. I will do quality control, so try to post good entries! None of 'she squishes u the end'.

Have fun and try not to get squished. ;)
